Review Name: Super! Review Description: Before buying this AC for my hall which is quite big around 6x4m with attached open kitchen i bit dubious will it work for me or or need to go for 2Ton, but this AC has cleared my all doubts. Pros.. 1. Not only it is providing constant cooling but it saves energy too as it 5 star. 2. Dual inverter feature assure constant temperature. 3. The indoor unit is quite and also the outdoor unit have no vibrations at all. 4. You Can change the output power from 80%,60% to 40% which saves a lot of electricity. 5. Easy to use and well built remote. Cons. 1. Remote have no LCD light which makes it difficult to use in night. 2. I found bit difficult to remove and install its filter for cleaning. The LG installation guys were promt and installed on the same day and were quite professional in their work. You just need ti pay for extra piping work and for stand for outdoor unit.
